prev.title: Users: Interacting with a User That Has Not Been Activated

title: Users: Managing a User
body:
Users: Managing a User¶


  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Team

  3. Click Users

  4. Click a user to view user details

  5. Click Access to view the apps and respective rights

    • Each app will display the message “This user doesn’t have access to this app” or next to the rights the user has

  6. Click Notifications to view the user’s notification preferences

  7. Click to view the options for interacting with the user

    • The options available differ depending on if the user has activated their account , has not activated their account , or has been disabled
